mapper.select: select a.no,a.user_no as userNo,a.group_no as groupNo, a.description, a.visible,a.git_name as gitName, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as regDate from git a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and b.id = #{id} and a.group_no is NULL order by reg_date desc;

select a.no, a.user_no as userNo , a.group_no as groupNo, a.description, a.visible, a.git_name as gitName, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as regDate from git a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.git_name=#{repoName} and b.id=#{id}
select no from user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule values(null, #{commitDate}, #{contents_short}, 'commit', #{userNo}, (select group_no from git where no = #{gitNo}), #{gitNo})
insert into timeline values(null, #{contents}, now(), #{visible}, (select group_no from git where no = #{gitNo}), (select user_no from git where no = #{gitNo}), 'commit')
mapper.select: select a.no,a.user_no as userNo,a.group_no as groupNo, a.description, a.visible,a.git_name as gitName, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as regDate, b.id as userId from git a join user b on a.user_no = b.no where a.group_no = #{groupNo} and a.no not in(select no from git where user_no != #{userNo} and visible="private" ) order by reg_date desc;

select a.no,a.user_no as userNo,a.group_no as groupNo, a.description, a.visible,a.git_name as gitName, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as regDate from git a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and b.id = #{id} order by reg_date desc;
select visible from git where no = #{gitNo}
select group_no from git where user_no = #{userNo} and git_name = #{repoName}
select U.id from `group` G join group_list GL on (G.no = GL.group_no) join user U on (GL.user_no) = U.no where G.no = #{groupNo} and GL.`grant` != 'user_req' order by GL.`grant`

select G.no as no, G.user_no as userNo, G.group_no as groupNo, G.description as description, G.visible as visible, G.git_name as gitName, G.reg_date as regDate, U.id as userId from git G join user U on (G.user_no = U.no) where G.no = #{alarmRefNo};
select no from git where user_no = (select U.no from user U where U.id=#{gitOwnerId}) and git_name = #{repoName};
